spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but wall thicknesses and exact window aperture sizes vary from the 2D plan. The staircase to the right is significantly truncated in the 3D render.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the full run of the staircase (E1). The laundry/storage area below the bathroom shows hallucinated armchair-like objects instead of standard storage geometry (E5). Door swings are rendered as literal curved walls rather than architectural symbols.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen island and bedroom furniture are well-placed. The dining set has been simplified into a single rectangular block.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent lighting and clean clay-render style. Isometric perspective is consistent. Visual clarity is high, though labels are rendered as 3D text which is a stylistic choice.

detected_errors.description: The full staircase run on the right side of the plan is missing/shortened in 3D.
Hallucinated seating inside the storage/laundry room defined by the 2D plan.
Double doors on the left balcony are rendered as jagged wall segments rather than clean swinging panels.
Window dimensions along the bottom wall are inconsistent with the 2D rhythm.
